籤詩版本二:
Injabulo ephambi kwami ​​ayiyona intokozo, futhi ayikhululekile ngezikhathi zengozi.
Kungani kudingekile ukusika inyama ukuze ulungise izilonda?Kungcono ukulinda isikhathi bese ulungisa izilonda → ziba izilonda.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokusika inyama ibe izilonda.
Zonke izinto kufanele zenziwe ngesikhathi.
解曰: Uma wazi ukuthi umisa kanjani, yima. Yazi ukuzithethelela. Zisike inyama. Ubuhlungu obujwayelekile.
籤詩故事一:
◇ U-Sun Bin uvalelekile futhi uPang Juan uvaleleke
Ngenkathi Yezizwe Ezilwayo, uSun Bin wayengowokuzalwa eQi. UPang Juan wayengowokuzalwa e-Wei. Wayephinde akhonze uGu Guzi njengothisha wakhe.
U-Sun Bin wayengcono ekufundeni kuno-Pang Juan.Ngenkathi u-Pang Juan engujenene esifundazweni sase-Wei, walwa no-Sun Bin empini yobuhlakani futhi wazonda u-Sun Bin lapho ehlulwa.
Wasebenzisa iqhinga lokunquma izinyawo zikaSun Bin, kamuva uSun Bin wazenza umuntu ohlanya wakwazi ukubaleka.
Inkosi u-Wei yaseQi yasebenzisa u-Sun Bin njengomeluleki wayo wezempi. Hola amasosha ukuze ahlasele i-Wei.
U-Sun Bin wasebenzisa indlela yokwenza sengathi unciphisa amandla esitha nokwandisa amabutho akhe ngasese. Wakhohlisa uPang Juan futhi wamjaha kuMaling Road. Udutshulwe wabulawa isosha elalimqamekele ngomnsalo.
聖意: Ukungakhululeki ekhaya, ukuzikhulumela, ukufuna ingcebo, ibhizinisi elingalungile, umshado wesikhohlakali awuhlali isikhathi eside, Liujia, abantu abavimba amasimu, ukulimala kweminyundu, ukulimala kwemfuyo eyisithupha, ukucinga abantu, amacala angekho emphakathini, ukulahlekelwa, ukufuduka, ukugcinwa kwemvelo, ukulahlekelwa. impahla, okunzima ukuyithola, ukugula, amathuna aphindaphindiwe asezintabeni, okungekuhle
古人: U-Sun Bin uvalelekile futhi uPang Juan uvaleleke
